snippet: American Sam Querrey claimed the biggest title of his career with an emphatic 6-3 7-6(3) upset victory over second seed Rafa Nadal in the final of the Mexican Open on Saturday....

headline.main: No. 3 UCLA Beats Washington State 77-68 for 9th Straight Win
headline.print_headline: No. 3 UCLA Beats Washington State 77-68 for 9th Straight Win

lead_paragraph: American Sam Querrey claimed the biggest title of his career with an emphatic 6-3 7-6(3) upset victory over second seed Rafa Nadal in the final of the Mexican Open on Saturday.
